title: Release - 'Hcltech Partners With IIT Guwahati To Upskill Employees In AI' 23h - HCLTech partners with IIT Guwahati to offer 4-year online BSc AI degree to TechBee employees.

title: Release - 'Hcltech Included In S&P Global Sustainability Yearbook For The Third Year In A Row' 1d - HCLTech included in S&P Sustainability Yearbook for third consecutive year, highlighting strong sustainability efforts.

title: Release - 'Hcltech Collaborates With Microsoft To Roll Out AI-Enabled Solution To Accelerate RISE With SAP S/4HANA Migrations' 1d - HCLTech partners with Microsoft to launch AI-driven solution for faster, cost-effective SAP S/4HANA migrations.
date: 1d - HCLTech partners with Microsoft to launch AI-driven solution for faster, cost-effective SAP S/4HANA migrations.

title: Release - 'Six Hcltech Campuses In India Receive The Coveted TRUE Zero Waste Platinum Certification' 2d - Six HCLTech campuses awarded TRUE Zero Waste Platinum Certification for sustainability efforts.
